timeline.message:
Fixed crash with zip paths

my bad

timeline.bodyText: If I read vanilla code correctly, the path should not point to the zip entry, but to the file of the pack (which is the mod file in this case). So you can do modFile.getFilePath().toFile() which should be fine as the mod jar always exists, and use the vanilla exception
timeline.author: ichttt

timeline.message: revert to vanilla exception but with path of the resourcepack

timeline.bodyText: This import isn't needed anymore since the used exception is ResourcePackFileNotFoundException again, right?
timeline.author: ToMe25
